title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 88-2.3 - Emergencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 88-2.3 - Emergencies

State Regulations

Any of the prescribed requirements for admission may be waived on behalf of an applicant ostensibly qualified for admission in an emergency requiring the immediate admission of the applicant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
88-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
